body_html:
That's right, one can't log in with a GitHub Org account. People can just sign up as a representative of that company.

In order to make that visible I guess we'd need an interested_in_comment text field or something so they can give additional information, like, in this case, the company name.

body:
That's right, one can't log in with a GitHub Org account. People can just sign up as a representative of that company. 

In order to make that visible I guess we'd need an `interested_in_comment` text field or something so they can give additional information, like, in this case, the company name.
